The Obama campaign: s claim that "Mitt Romney's companies were pioneers in outsourcing U.S. jobs to low-wage countries" was fact-checked by multiple news organizations, including FactCheck.org and the Washington Post.
These fact: checkers concluded that the claims made by the Obama campaign were exaggerated and overstated.
Romney: s role as the founder of Bain Capital was highlighted, emphasizing his influence and direction in the company's activities, even after he left management in 1999.
